title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: The close button moves down when the view, such as the Navigator, is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127. This issue does not occur on build 20011116 on Nt2000.
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label.
EB: The close button should remain in its original position when the view is resized smaller.
SR:
1. Open the application on Linux with build 20011127.
2. Open a view, such as the Navigator.
3. Resize the view to be smaller.
4. Observe the position of the close button. It should remain in its original position.
